title: The Tova Perfume Letter
subject: How a Frumpy Housewife Became a Millionaire
author: Gary Halbert
body:
Dear Friend,

Her name is Tova Borgnine.

And 15 years ago, she was a frumpy, overweight housewife with a failing marriage and no prospects.

Today?

She's a multi-millionaire with her own perfume line, a successful marriage, and women all over the world trying to be like her.

What changed?

One thing.

And it wasn't what you think.

It wasn't a diet.

It wasn't a facelift.

It wasn't a new wardrobe.

It was a fragrance.

Let me explain:

You see, Tova discovered something that scientists have known for years but nobody was using:

The sense of smell is the most powerful trigger of human emotion and memory.

Smell something, and you're instantly transported back to a specific time, place, and feeling.

It bypasses your conscious mind and hits your emotions directly.

And when you smell good - really good - something interesting happens:

People treat you differently.

They're more attracted to you.

More interested in you.

More drawn to you.

Without knowing why.

Now, Tova couldn't afford expensive French perfumes.

So she started experimenting with essential oils in her kitchen.

Mixing.

Testing.

Trying different combinations.

Until one day, she created something special.

A fragrance that made people stop and notice her.

A fragrance that made her feel confident, attractive, desirable.

A fragrance that literally changed her life.

Her husband noticed the change.

Their marriage improved.

Friends started asking what perfume she was wearing.

Then friends of friends.

Then strangers.

Until finally, she was selling her homemade perfume to women all over Los Angeles.

And that's when I met her.

She asked me to help her take her perfume national.

And I said yes - but only if we could make it available to regular women at a reasonable price.

Not $200 like French perfumes.

Not even $100.

But just $39.95 for a full bottle that will last you 3-6 months.

Now, I know what you're thinking:

"If it's that cheap, it can't be that good."

But here's the thing:

Expensive perfumes aren't expensive because of the ingredients.

They're expensive because of the advertising, the fancy bottles, the department store markups, and the designer names.

The actual perfume costs maybe $3 to make.

Tova's costs the same to make.

But we skip all the expensive stuff.

No fancy advertising campaigns.

No department store markups.

No designer name premium.

Just a beautiful fragrance that works.

And because we're so confident you'll love it, we're making you this guarantee:

Order Tova's perfume today.

Wear it for 30 days.

See how it makes you feel.

See how people respond to you.

If you're not absolutely thrilled with the results, send back even the empty bottle and we'll refund every penny.

No questions asked.

You literally cannot lose.

Either this perfume changes your life like it did Tova's...

Or you get your money back.

But I'll bet you keep it.

Because I've never met a woman who tried it and didn't fall in love with it.

So here's what to do:

Call the number below and order your bottle of Tova perfume today.

Or if you prefer, mail in the enclosed order form with your check or credit card information.

Either way, you'll have your perfume within 10 business days.

And 30 days from now, you'll understand why Tova went from frumpy housewife to millionaire.

It's not magic.

It's just the power of the right fragrance.

Order now.

Your friend,

Gary C. Halbert

P.S. This offer is limited to the first 1,000 orders. After that, we may have to increase the price to cover increased demand. So order now while the price is still just $39.95.
